snippet: A few recipes to get your kids started cooking.
abstract: A few recipes to get your kids started cooking.
lead_paragraph: In today's Dining section I write about my determination to have my two sons, ages 10 and 14, cook dinner for the family once a week. One of the biggest obstacles to overcome is deciding what to make. After months of practice, we still do not have a systematic way of doing this, but here are some recipes that worked:

headline.main: Kids Cooking: Recipes to Get You Started
